version.desc: the current version of the contract

akitaDAO.desc: the app ID of the Akita DAO

escrows.desc: box map of all the escrows

receiveAssets.desc: box map of escrow assets that have already been processed during this allocation

splits.desc: how to split revenue & where to send it + how to manage optins
